name.baseName: Aluminum electrolysis carbon anode production ; Carbon anode ; Petroleum coke ; 2013
铝电解碳阳极生产 ; 碳阳极 ; 石油焦 ; 2013年

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: This dataset describes the production of carbon anodes using petroleum coke for aluminum electrolysis. Carbon anodes are crucial components in the aluminum smelting process, where they are used to conduct electrical current during the electrolysis of alumina (Al2O3). The high levels of electrical and thermal conductivity of carbon anodes make them suitable for this application. The carbon anodes described are specifically manufactured for the aluminum industry and are not intended for other applications such as fuel cells or battery technology.
该数据集描述了使用石油焦生产铝电解碳阳极的过程。碳阳极是铝冶炼过程中的关键组件，在氧化铝（Al2O3）的电解过程中用于传导电流。碳阳极的高电导率和热导率使其适合于此应用。所述的碳阳极专门为铝工业生产，不适用于其它应用，如燃料电池或电池技术。

technology.technologicalApplicability: This dataset describes the production of carbon anodes using petroleum coke for aluminum electrolysis. Carbon anodes are crucial components in the aluminum smelting process, where they are used to conduct electrical current during the electrolysis of alumina (Al2O3). The high levels of electrical and thermal conductivity of carbon anodes make them suitable for this application. The carbon anodes described are specifically manufactured for the aluminum industry and are not intended for other applications such as fuel cells or battery technology.
该数据集描述了使用石油焦生产铝电解碳阳极的过程。碳阳极是铝冶炼过程中的关键组件，在氧化铝（Al2O3）的电解过程中用于传导电流。碳阳极的高电导率和热导率使其适合于此应用。所述的碳阳极专门为铝工业生产，不适用于其它应用，如燃料电池或电池技术。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: The data in this study refers to the LCA data of PA, SA, electricity, and other background data. The PA data were obtained from statistical data sources, and the SA data were mainly obtained from the literatures. The background data were mainly derived from the Chinese localization LCA database CAS RCEES 2018, which was established by the Research Center for Eco-Environmental Sciences, Chinese Academy of Sciences and covers LCA data for energy, materials, transportation, waste management etc.
本研究的数据参考了PA、SA、电力等背景数据的LCA数据。PA数据来自统计数据源，SA数据主要来自文献。背景数据主要来自中国科学院生态环境研究中心CASRCEES 2018建立的中国本地化LCA数据库，涵盖能源、材料、交通、废物管理等LCA数据。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Ding, N., Liu, N., Lu, B. & Yang, J. Life cycle greenhouse gas emissions of aluminum based on regional industrial transfer in China. J. Ind. Ecol. 25, 1657–1672 (2021).
Ding, N., Liu, N., Lu, B. & Yang, J. Life cycle greenhouse gas emissions of aluminum based on regional industrial transfer in China. J. Ind. Ecol. 25, 1657–1672 (2021).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: The LCA data provided should be applied carefully, ensuring that methodological consistency is maintained with the study's base year (2013). Users should note that the Process Analysis (PA) data reflects statistical data sources, while the System Analysis (SA) data is primarily derived from literature. The background data is sourced from the CAS RCEES 2018 Chinese localization LCA database. It is important to reflect on the technological advancements and industry changes since the base year when using this data in current assessments. Additionally, the geographical specificity of the LCA database suggests that these data are most useful for studies concerning the Chinese context. When considering recycling in LCA, users must acknowledge that the data may not include end-of-life considerations, thus recycling processes may need to be modeled separately.

提供的LCA数据应谨慎应用，确保与研究基年(2013年)保持方法论的一致性。用户应注意，过程分析(PA)数据反映统计数据来源，而系统分析(SA)数据主要来自文献。背景数据来源于中国科学院生态环境研究中心建立的2018年中国本土化LCA数据库CAS RCEES。在使用这些数据进行当前评估时，重要的是要考虑基年以来技术进步和行业变化。此外，LCA数据库的地理特定性表明，这些数据对涉及中国情境的研究最有用。在考虑LCA回收时，用户必须承认数据可能不包括生命周期末期的考虑，因此可能需要单独对回收过程进行建模。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
